feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E102E01 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 27, 21:00 UTC  -  Oct 28, 00:00 UTC

Sep 16, 22:36 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on rack E102E01.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 27/10/2025 21:00 UTC
End time: 28/10/2025 00:00 UTC
Service impact: During the operation, servers in rack E102E01 will be temporarily unavailable.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate servers in rack E102E01 to rack ERI0102A03A.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks G114B24 - G114B21 network equipment maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 8, 00:00 - 02:00 UTC

Sep 16, 13:33 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure in the specific racks G114B24 - G114B21.

Start time : 08/10/2025 00:00 UTC
End time : 08/10/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Public and vRack network will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment in racks G114B24 and G114B21.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Dedicated Servers] - Maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 7, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

Aug 21, 20:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, change is scheduled on our API.
âš  API change
The 7th of October 2025, the following API calls will be definitely removed:
- All API calls under /me/installationTemplate
- POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start.
Customers can migrate to its successor POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/reinstall.

Start time: 07/10/2025 08:30 UTC
End time: 07/10/2025 08:45 UTC
Service impact: None
More details about the change: End of life for personal installation templates.

Thank you for your understanding.
